name: Ulti
text: On Play: If your leader is multicolored, look at the top 3 cards of your deck and add 1 to your hand. Then, place the rest in any order on the top or bottom of your deck.

effect.text: If your leader is multicolored, look at the top 3 cards of your deck and add 1 to your hand. Then, place the rest in any order on the top or bottom of your deck.
